item.title: Kerry Washington, Greg Berlanti and Joseph Gordon-Levitt Set for A Day of Unreasonable Conversation
item.description: The summit, put on by Propper Daley BPI to start a dialogue between creators and policymakers, returns to the Getty Center on Oct. 6.

item.title: On AI and Copyright, Trump Is Groveling Before Big Tech and Selling Out Working Americans
item.description: It’s not just creatives threatened by Silicon Valley’s ethically questionable business model.
